text: randall_culver I told you-- .
daryl_dixon You told me shit !
randall_culver I barely knew those guys . I met 'em on the road .
daryl_dixon How many in your group ?
randall_culver Uh , no no no no no no no no no no . Come on , man .
daryl_dixon How many ? !
randall_culver Uh , 30 . 30 . 30 guys .
daryl_dixon Where ?
randall_culver Uh . I do n't know . I swear . We were never anyplace more than a night .
daryl_dixon Scouting ? Planning on staying local ?
randall_culver I -- I do n't know . They -- they left me behind .
daryl_dixon Did you ever pick off a scab ?
randall_culver Come on , man ! I'm -- I'm trying to cooperate .
daryl_dixon Start real slow at first .
randall_culver No .
daryl_dixon Sooner or later , you 've just got ta rip it off .
randall_culver Okay . Okay . They have weapons -- heavy stuff , automatics . But I did n't do anything .
daryl_dixon Your boys shot at my boys , tried to take this farm . You just went along for the ride ? You 're trying to tell me you 're innocent ?

randall_culver Yes ! These -- these people took me in . Not just guys -- a whole group of 'em . Men and women , kids too -- just like you people . Thought I 'd have a better chance with them , you know ? But . we go out , scavenge -- just the men . One night we -- we found this little campsite . A man and his two daughters -- teenagers , you know ? Real young . Real cute . Their daddy had to watch while these guys -- they -- and they did n't even kill him afterwards . They just -- they just made him watch as his daughters -- they just - just -- just left him there . No , but - but -- but I did n't touch those girls . No , I swear I did n't to-- Please . Please . You got ta believe me , man . I 'm not lie that . I ai n't like that . Please . Please . You got ta believe me .

daryl_dixon Had a little chat .

dale_horvath You 're just gon na kill him ?
rick_grimes It 's settled . I 'll do it today .
dale_horvath You ca n't do this . You do n't wanna do this . I know you do n't .

dale_horvath But you ca n't just decide on your own to take someone 's life .
rick_grimes The group seemed supportive .
dale_horvath What , because they did n't speak back ? You did n't let 'em . There 's got ta be a -- a process .
rick_grimes And what would that be ? We ca n't call witnesses , go before a judge .
dale_horvath So he 's automatically guilty by association and sentenced to death ? He 's just a kid . Gimme some time to talk to everyone .
rick_grimes We can't-- .
dale_horvath . Try to figure out another way-- .
rick_grimes No , we ca n't drag this out . People are scared .
dale_horvath Which is why they need time to discuss this .
rick_grimes No no no , they need to be safe . I owe 'em that .

dale_horvath You think about your son , the message that you 're giving him -- shoot first , think later . I 'm asking for one day to talk to everybody . You can give me that . Think -- think about carl .
rick_grimes I am . We reconvene at sunset , then what happens happens .
dale_horvath I need a favor .
andrea_harrison Did you move the gun bag ?
dale_horvath Yeah . I need you to guard Randall , protect him .
andrea_harrison Why ?
dale_horvath Rick 's giving me time to talk to the others , try and talk some sense into them . But if shane finds out-- .
andrea_harrison You think he 'd just shoot the guy himself ?
dale_horvath You know killing the boy had to be his idea . Are you with him on this ?
andrea_harrison He 's a threat . Tell me this is n't all the ammo .
dale_horvath You 're a civil rights lawyer .
andrea_harrison Was .
dale_horvath You fight with words , the power of ideas . Using a -- a gun , that 's his way .
andrea_harrison You really want to debate about saving a guy who will lead his buddies right to our door ?
dale_horvath That 's what a civilized society does .
andrea_harrison Who says we 're civilized anymore ?
dale_horvath No , the world we knew is gone , but keeping our humanity ? That 's a choice .
andrea_harrison I 'll watch your prisoner , but not because I think you 're right .
randall_culver Oh man . Hello ? Hey . Can I get some water ? Please ? I 'm very thirsty . They 're gon na kill me , right ?

shane_walsh He ai n't a kid . Just -- that 's a figure of speech .
carl_grimes Can I see him ?
shane_walsh No . Look , man , this is -- this is grown - up stuff , all right ? You just -- you just let us handle this .
shane_walsh Dale , huh ? What , he put you on death watch ? Let me ask you something -- say I wanted to go in there right now and I just wanted to take care of this , you gon na stop me ? Hmm ?
andrea_harrison I had a good teacher .
shane_walsh Yeah . So what , you buy into Dale 's sob story ?
andrea_harrison I told him I was with you on this .

shane_walsh Mmm . You 're just still here for him , huh ? That 's cute . You see what 's happening , do n't you ? These guys ai n't gon na go through with this . I 'm telling you , they gonna -- they gon na pussy out . And if they do , we gon na have a big problem on our hands . Let me ask you something -- every time we have a problem around here , who do you think 's behind it ?
andrea_harrison Some might say you .
shane_walsh Nah . No one listens to me . I say it 's the guys that make up the rules , the boys that always have all the answers , even though their answers always prove wrong .
andrea_harrison So what are you gon na do ? Rick 's the leader of this group , it 's Hershel 's farm .
shane_walsh Maybe we oughta change that .
andrea_harrison What , are you gon na lock 'em in a room and take their guns ? I do n't know . That could get out of hand .
shane_walsh No no , it wo n't . Okay ? I wo n't let it . Listen , I don't -- I do n't want anybody to get hurt , okay ? Rick 's my friend , Hershel -- he 's all right by me .
andrea_harrison And Dale ?
shane_walsh dale got a big mouth , but he 's harmless . Look , I just -- I wanna know what it 's like to sleep without keeping one eye open . Ai n't that -- ain't that what we all want ?
shane_walsh Hey , ball 's in their court . Maybe I 'm wrong .

randall_culver Hey . That 's a sweet hat . I 'm Randall . What 's your name ? The sheriff guy -- that your dad ? I like him . Yeah , he 's a good guy . I can tell . Your mom out here too ? You're -- you're lucky you still got your family . I lost mine . Hey , I -- I do n't know what people been saying about me , but I did n't do nothing . I swear . Your dad was gon na let me go till his friend started fighting with him . It got pretty bad . I -- I was kinda worried . My camp , we got lots of supplies . You help me , I 'll take you and your folks back to my people . We 'll take good care of you . Keep you safe . Just gotta -- just got ta help me get out of here , okay ? Just help me pick these locks or find the key , okay ? Come on , please ? Please ?
shane_walsh What the hell are you doing in here ? What did you say to him ? What did you say to him , huh ?
randall_culver I did n't say nothing .

shane_walsh Let me tell you something -- I will shoot you where you sit .
andrea_harrison Okay Shane , not now .
shane_walsh Open your mouth . Open your mouth .
andrea_harrison shane .
shane_walsh You like talking , man ? You like talking ? !
andrea_harrison Back off !
shane_walsh Get your ass out this door . Let 's go .
shane_walsh The hell you doing ?

shane_walsh Carl , that ai n't cool , man . You could 've gotten hurt in there .
carl_grimes I can handle myself .
shane_walsh Let me tell you something -- you do not go near him again . Do you hear me ? Damn it .
carl_grimes You wo n't tell my parents , will you ?

shane_walsh carl man , this-- this is n't about getting in trouble , okay ? A guy like that , he will say anything to you . He 'll try to make you feel sorry for him . He 'll try to make you let your guard down . You let your guard down out here , people die . Now just -- do me a favor , man -- go find your ma . Go on . Carl , quit trying to get yourself killed , man .
daryl_dixon The whole point of me and my family coming up here is to get away from you people .
dale_horvath Gon na take more than that .
daryl_dixon carol send you ?

dale_horvath You act like you do n't care .
daryl_dixon Yeah , It 's 'cause I do n't .
dale_horvath So live or die , you do n't care what happens to Randall ?
daryl_dixon Nope .
dale_horvath Then why not stand with me , try to save the kid 's life , if it really does n't matter one way or the other ?
daryl_dixon Did n't peg you for a desperate son of a bitch .
dale_horvath Your opinion makes a difference .
daryl_dixon Man , ai n't nobody looking at me for nothing .
dale_horvath carol is , and I am . right now . And you obviously -- you have Rick 's ears .
daryl_dixon rick just looks to Shane . Let him .
dale_horvath You cared about what happened to Sophia , cared what it meant to the group . Torturing people ? That is n't you . You 're a decent man . So is Rick . Shane -- he 's different .
daryl_dixon What 's that ? 'Cause he killed Otis ?
dale_horvath He tell you that ?

daryl_dixon He told some story -- how Otis covered him , saved his ass . He showed up with the dead guy 's gun . rick ai n't stupid . If he did n't figure that out , it 's 'cause he did n't wanna . It 's like I said -- group 's broken .

carl_grimes He 's up there .

lori_grimes No , I -- I don't-- .
carol_peletier I do n't need you to patronize me . Everyone either avoids me or they treat me like I 'm crazy . I lost my daughter . I did n't lose my mind !

carl_grimes No .
rick_grimes She says you did . You ca n't talk back to people like that .

carl_grimes But she-- .

carl_grimes Mom always wants you to talk more .

rick_grimes You just think about how you 're gon na make things right with Carol . Do n't talk . Think . You got it ?

dale_horvath What happened ?
hershel_greene A dozen steer busted through the fence . Been wrangling the runways all morning . But you 're not here to talk cattle .

If you 've convinced them to keep this guy alive , I ai n't gon na say a damn word about it , okay ? But I 'm telling you now , man to man , you 're wrong . And when this guy kills somebody I ai n't gon na need to say anything , because that blood -- that 's gon na be on you . You 're wrong about this , Dale . You 're damn wrong .

glenn_rhee Well , let me know if I can do anything .
hershel_greene Where 's you family from ?
glenn_rhee Michigan . But before that , Korea .
hershel_greene Immigrants built this country . Never forget that . Our family came from Ireland .
glenn_rhee maggie Greene -- I kinda figured .
hershel_greene My grandfather brought this over from the old country . He passed it on to my father , who passed it on to me . I pawned it to pay for a night of drinking I no longer remember .
glenn_rhee You bought it back .

hershel_greene My late wife did -- Josephine , Maggie 's mother . She gave it back years later when I sobered up . She was a good woman , my Jo . Maggie 's a lot like her . When we were in that bar and afterwards , I thought about a lot of things . You become a father someday , you 'll understand . No man is good enough for your little girl until one is . Go on now , before I change my mind about you .
glenn_rhee Thanks .

You saved him and now look at us . He 's been tortured . He 's gon na be executed . How are we any better than those people that we 're so afraid of ?
